forum.content:
I know I'm probably better off on my own
Than lovin' a man who didn't know
What he had when he had it
And I see the permanent damage you did to me
Never again, I just wish I could forget when it was magic
I wish it wasn't four am, standing in the mirror
Saying to myself, you know you had to do it I know
The bravest thing I ever did was run

Read more: Little Big Town - Better Man Lyrics | MetroLyrics

urls.description: santai serius selesai semoga mendapat yang terbaik.....
urls.title: Lirik Robbie Williams - Better Man

forum.title: 好聽的一首歌
